titleStmt.title: A short description of the blessed place and state of the saints above in a discourse upon the words of Our Blessed Saviour, John XIV, 2, in my father's house are many mansions, if it were not so, I would have told you, I go to prepare a place for you / by William Bates.
titleStmt.author: Bates, William, 1625-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.D. for J. Robinson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
